website_summaries.verdict: Improve your game instantly with this reliable, mid-range racquet.
pros: This model sits in a sweet spot of high-end materials and fair prices
The handle is crafted from tough 7000-grade aluminum to withstand impact, and the 16g monofilament strings gives players more spin and more power at ball impact
In addition, reviewers found the handle comfortable to hold over prolonged use
cons: Some players deemed this racquet a bit too heavy

customer_reviews.title: Great begginer or imtermediate racquet.
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner racquet. If you are just starting out and don't want to spend the $ right away on a really good one this is perfect for you. I probably have 20 hours into it and it has been great. If you start developing wrist or elbow issues one of the lighter more expensive racquets would be next or if you think you already have issues you might want to spend the extra 50-75 to get a light one.
customer_reviews.author: Reebekili

customer_reviews.title: Great Racquet!
customer_reviews.text: The racquetball has less sweet spot area than the ones i used from ekleton but the ball definitely comes off harder from it. Grip is great and overall its lightweight. I strongly suggest beginners to get this racquet instead of buying a more expensive one as this one might be easier to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Raza Agha

customer_reviews.title: Solid Racquet
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid racquet. A bit heavy but overall nice grip and solid build. The frame is sturdy and a bit heavy. I like a heavier racquet so this fits with me but if you are looking for light, you may want to look elsewhere. The price I bought on Amazon was $39.XX but the price on the racquet was $34.95 when it arrived.... not sure what the deal is there. I guess they need to cover their shipping costs but it was kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Crane Wegrzyn

customer_reviews.title: Great power for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner racquet, definitely lighter than the ones I rented at the gym. The frame shape is hybrid so it has less of a "sweet spot" compared to a teardrop shaped racquet, but this definitely increases the power behind your shots. Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald H

customer_reviews.title: Great rackets!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter got me to play racquetball on a whim at the gym and we loved it so much I decided to invest in a couple of rackets, stumbled across these on Amazon and so happy I did. They are the perfect size and weight, and a very nice price. Had no idea rackets could have such a wide range of prices. These are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Great racket!’
customer_reviews.text: I’m just beginning to become a more serious player and I noticed immediately what a lighter racket like this with a larger sweet spot than my old one can do the help my game. It’s quicker to the ball and just a flick off my wrist gets the ball to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Bagels

customer_reviews.title: Great racket!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my birthday and I love it. It's a little bigger than my husband's but it's super light.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle A Yates

customer_reviews.title: but my son totally loved this, and that is 5 stars in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't play racketball, but my son totally loved this, and that is 5 stars in my book. Merry Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: beaglegirl

customer_reviews.title: Good so far!
customer_reviews.text: Good. I bought two, and used a padded handle wrap on one for my son since his hands are smaller. Holding up great so far for a couple of recreational players
customer_reviews.author: Alan H.

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you know how to fix it
customer_reviews.text: Grip is not glued properly and came off after 3 games. String is also loose and needed adjustments
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Certainly an upgrade from the racquets I was checking out at the rec center. So far so good. I've used it 3 or 4 times now and had to get used to how much lighter it was from the others I have used. Again, so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: eriq the red

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Racket for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: 1) Good Grip. 2) Strings haven't loosened after using for almost a year. 3) Good for Beginners
customer_reviews.author: Darky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: improved my game by having good strong strings which gives your good ball control. Very light weight and durable and I love the colors of the racket.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Rodney Fuhrman

customer_reviews.title: Great racket!
customer_reviews.text: They are light, sturdy, and are great rackets for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Very nice racquet. Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice racquet. Great deal for the price. Quality grip. Heavier than my last one but I enjoy it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Light racquet with a nice grip and good pop off the strings. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin

customer_reviews.title: This racquet feels amazing for this price
customer_reviews.text: This racquet feels amazing for this price. Probably won't find anything else this great in this price range. It is slightly handle heavy so it feels extremely light.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Most contact feels like a miss hit.
customer_reviews.text: Love the way this racquet swings and feels in the hand but it feels like most contact is a miss hit unless the ball is squared up perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great maneuverability!
customer_reviews.text: It seems that I Am Able to maneuver this racket a lot better than the more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Arsh

customer_reviews.title: $10 overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I’m learning to play racquetball, this racket is light and perfect for beginners. I’m happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: The racquet is a little stiff and low power for my ideal racket. I will probably change the strings to a synthetic gut with a lower tension. But for the price you cannot beat it
customer_reviews.author: Porfirio
